Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S variant showed 40% reduced viability compared to wild-type.
LRRK2 R1441C variant showed 30% reduced viability compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability above 70% is considered normal.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability below 50% is considered abnormal.

Material used.Description: Protein expression levels were analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S showed 35% increased kinase activity compared to wild-type.
LRRK2 R1441C showed 25% increased kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Kruskal-Wallis test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 80-120% of wild-type is considered normal.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression outside 80-120% of wild-type is considered abnormal.

Material used.Description: Subcellular localization of LRRK2 variants was analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S showed abnormal cytoplasmic aggregation compared to wild-type.
LRRK2 R1414C showed abnormal mitochondrial localization compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal localization is cytoplasmic with no aggregation.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Abnormal localization includes aggregation or mitochondrial localization.
